item.description:
Are you interested in beading but overwhelmed by the colors, sizes, shapes and other terms? Introduction to Beading will get you started on a wonderfully addictive and fulfilling journey. Join us for a tour where weâ€™ll explain the different kinds of beads, sizes and tools. We will also demonstrate how to attach a clasp using crimp beads so you will be well on your way to making bracelets and necklaces.

Date: Friday, October 23 at 6:00pm
Duration: 20 minutes
Fee: A Smile
Please call Abeille at 617.232.4343 to register or register online at Abeille

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Beading Demonstration (FREE)
